```{r setup}
library(hpsr)
library(tidyverse)
```


## Data
 
### hpsr
 
This package provides week 1 through week 63 Household Pulse Survey datasets. The datasets are available for public use through the US Census website. Each week is labeled as "data_week" as a prefix, and each week number as a suffix (1, 2, 3, ... 63)
 
## Loading Data
Data for each week can be loaded by specifying which week (1-63) to load:
```{r, echo = TRUE}
data("data_week1")
data("data_week2")
# .
# .
# .
data("data_week63")
 
```
 
 
## Glimpse the Data
Data for each week can be glimpsed by using glimpse function from tidyverse package on individual datasets.
```{r, echo = TRUE}
library(tidyverse)
 
glimpse(data_week1)
 
```
